#summary The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO)
#sidebar SIOSideBar

= Introduction =

The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO) provides a simple, integrated ontology of types and relations for rich description of objects, processes and their attributes. 

The OWL2 ontology is available at

http://semanticscience.org/ontology/sio.owl

or view with the [http://owl.cs.manchester.ac.uk/browser/ontologies/1142438203/?session=13ec35565a4-266-13ec355e014  manchester ontology browser]: 

This project provides foundational support for the Bio2RDF (http://bio2rdf.org) and SADI (http://sadiframework.org) projects. 


= Details =

Documentation is under development. Design patterns are being defined, which are listed on the left hand pane.  If you have questions please send to SIO mailing list (sio-ontology@googlegroups.com; http://groups.google.com/group/sio-ontology)
